<a name="process-nextick-args"></a>process-nextick-args
=====

[![組建狀態](https://travis-ci.org/calvinmetcalf/process-nextick-args.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/calvinmetcalf/process-nextick-args)

```bash
npm install --save process-nextick-args
```

不論平台為何，一律能夠將引數傳遞至 process.nextTick

```js
var pna = require('process-nextick-args');

pna.nextTick(function (a, b, c) {
  console.log(a, b, c);
}, 'step', 3,  'profit');
```
